<%= data.polyglot.t("No Stocks / ETFs found") %>
<% } else { %> <% if ( !data.showTags && !data.showSymbols && !data.showRecent && !data.showSearch ) { %>
<%= data.polyglot.t("Our most popular Stocks / ETFs") %>
<% } else if ( data.showRecent && !data.showSearch ) { %>
<%= data.polyglot.t("products_most_viewed_personal") %>
<% } %>
    <% _.each( data.instruments, function( instrument ) { %> <% _.extend( data, { "instrument": instrument, }); print( data.templateInstRow( { "data": data } ) ); %> <% }); %>
<% } %> <% if ( !data.showAll && !data.thinQuotes ) { %>
<%= data.polyglot.t("Show All Stocks / ETFs") %>
<% } %>
